title: Stage Lv9-P4-S24
description: Level 9 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: What a brilliant idea to have a meeting about reducing meetings.
The fire station burned down while the firefighters were out on a call.
learning_points: Level 9 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 회의를 줄이기 위해 회의를 한다니, 정말 훌륭한 아이디어네요.
sentences.en: What a brilliant idea to have a meeting about reducing meetings.

sentences.kr: 소방서가 소방관들이 출동 중인 동안 불타 버렸습니다.
sentences.en: The fire station burned down while the firefighters were out on a call.

sentences.kr: 관료제를 만드는 데 있어 우리 정부가 얼마나 효율적인지 보세요.
sentences.en: How wonderfully efficient our government is at creating bureaucracy.

sentences.kr: 비를 맞으며 우산 파는 사람의 대기력이 대단하네요.
sentences.en: How admirable is the patience of someone selling umbrellas in the rain.

sentences.kr: 언젠가 온다는 하늘의 도움을 기다리는 중입니다.
sentences.en: We're waiting for help from heaven that will come someday.

sentences.kr: 완벽한 시스템을 만들었다고 자랑하는데 아무도 사용하지 않네요.
sentences.en: They boast of creating a perfect system that nobody uses.

sentences.kr: 세상에서 가장 비싼 고급 상품을 파는 지혜로움이지요.
sentences.en: What wisdom it is to sell the world's most expensive luxury goods.

sentences.kr: 모든 문제를 해결해주는 만능 앱이 아무 문제도 해결하지 못하다니요.
sentences.en: The all-solving app that solves no problems at all.
